mapper.select: SELECT tat.id, tat.album_id, tat.is_cover, tat.create_time, tt.thought_id, tt.code, tt.title, tt.main_img, tt.banner_img, tt.status, ta.album_title FROM thot_album_thought tat LEFT JOIN thot_thought tt ON tat.thought_id = tt.thought_id LEFT JOIN thot_album ta ON tat.album_id = ta.album_id WHERE tat.album_id = ${albumId}

SELECT tat.id, tat.album_id, tat.is_cover, tat.create_time, tt.thought_id, tt.code, tt.title, tt.main_img, tt.banner_img, tt.status, ta.album_title FROM thot_album_thought tat LEFT JOIN thot_thought tt ON tat.thought_id = tt.thought_id LEFT JOIN thot_album ta ON tat.album_id = ta.album_id WHERE tat.thought_id = ${thoughtId}

SELECT tat.id, tat.album_id, tat.is_cover, tat.create_time, tt.thought_id, tt.code, tt.title, tt.main_img, tt.banner_img, tt.status, ta.album_title FROM thot_album_thought tat LEFT JOIN thot_thought tt ON tat.thought_id = tt.thought_id LEFT JOIN thot_album ta ON tat.album_id = ta.album_id WHERE tat.album_id = ${albumId} AND tat.thought_id = ${thoughtId} LIMIT 1
